title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable, the Lords assembled in Parliament, in the abbey church of St. Peters, Westminster upon the fast-day appointed April 10, 1678 by William, Lord Bishop of St. Davids.
author: Thomas, William, 1613-1689.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for Tho. Collins and William Leach ...,
